hero.title: Grow your business with confidence
hero.subtitle: Practical, affordable consulting for small business owners who want to grow but don't know where to start. We help with strategy, operations, marketing, and finance - all the pieces you need to scale successfully.
hero.imageAlt: Small business owner working with consultant

about.title: Your Growth Partner
about.subtitle: We understand small business
about.content: GrowthPath was founded by former small business owners who know the challenges you face. We provide hands-on, practical advice that actually works - not corporate jargon. Our mission is to help local businesses thrive and create jobs in their communities.

products.name: Business Plan Package
products.description: Complete business plan including market research, financial projections, and strategy. Perfect for starting or pivoting.

products.name: Marketing Roadmap
products.description: Customer analysis, marketing strategy, and 90-day action plan. Focus on cost-effective tactics that work.

products.name: Financial Health Check
products.description: Review your numbers, identify problems, and create a cash flow improvement plan. Get your finances on track.

products.name: Operations Optimization
products.description: Streamline processes, reduce waste, and improve efficiency. More profit without working more hours.

products.name: Growth Strategy Session
products.description: Half-day intensive working session to solve your biggest business challenge. Actionable next steps included.

products.name: Monthly Advisory
products.description: Ongoing support with monthly check-ins, email access, and strategic guidance. Like having a business partner.

services.subtitle: Practical solutions for real business challenges

testimonials.title: Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from real business owners

items.text: Working with GrowthPath was the best investment I made in my business. Revenue is up 60% and I finally have systems that work. Highly recommend!
items.author: Sarah Johnson
items.title: Owner, Local Bakery

items.text: They helped me create a marketing plan I can actually afford and execute. Already seeing more customers and my email list has tripled!
items.author: Mike Chen
items.title: Fitness Studio Owner

items.text: The financial health check revealed problems I didn't even know I had. Fixed my cash flow issues in 60 days. Worth every penny.
items.author: Jessica Martinez
items.title: Retail Shop Owner

members.name: Tom Reynolds
members.title: Founder & Lead Consultant
members.bio: Built and sold two successful small businesses. MBA from NYU. Now dedicated to helping other entrepreneurs avoid the mistakes I made and achieve their dreams faster.
